addon.name: Armi Shipping Services
addon.description: Integrates Armi delivery services for dynamic shipping cost calculation using latitude/longitude and order management.

item.name: Armi API Base URL
item.tooltip: The base URL for the Armi API. Change only if you have a custom endpoint.

queries.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:armi_order_data` ( `order_id` MEDIUMINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `armi_order_id` VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, `armi_last_status_code` INT DEFAULT NULL, `armi_vehicle_type_id` INT DEFAULT NULL, `armi_payment_method_id` INT DEFAULT NULL, `armi_calculated_delivery_cost` DECIMAL(12, 2) DEFAULT NULL, `customer_destination_latitude` DECIMAL(10, 8) DEFAULT NULL, `customer_destination_longitude` DECIMAL(11, 8) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`order_id`), CONSTRAINT `fk_armi_order_data_order_id` FOREIGN KEY (`order_id`) REFERENCES `?:orders` (`order_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3;
